com.nttdocomo.ui
Interface ComponentListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
public interface ComponentListener
extends EventListener

This defines the event listener of a component. This class designates the interface that shall be implemented on the object that accepts the events generated at components in high level API.

See Also:
Panel

Field Summary
static int BUTTON_PRESSED
          This is an event that is issued when the button component is pressed (=1).
static int SELECTION_CHANGED
          This is an event that is issued when the selection of list items is changed (=2).
static int TEXT_CHANGED
          Tn event that is issued when the input of text character strings is finalized (=3).
 
Method Summary
 void componentAction(Component source, int type, int param)

Field Detail

BUTTON_PRESSED

public static final int BUTTON_PRESSED
This is an event that is issued when the button component is pressed (=1). This event is issued when the button component is in focus and a selection key is pressed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SELECTION_CHANGED

public static final int SELECTION_CHANGED
This is an event that is issued when the selection of list items is changed (=2).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TEXT_CHANGED

public static final int TEXT_CHANGED
Tn event that is issued when the input of text character strings is finalized (=3).

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

componentAction

public void componentAction(Component source,
                            int type,
                            int param)
This accepts events that occurred at components.

Parameters:
source - Sends the component at which the event occurred.
type - Sends the event types.
param - Sends the event parameters. The meaning of a parameter varies from component to component. Zero is sent for events without parameters.
